article_title: How well do you know Kay Hagan?
article_text: 1. What was notable about Kay Hagan’s 2008 Senate win, in which she unseated Elizabeth Dole? A. She won by the largest margin in a Senate race. B. It was the first time a female candidate unseated a female incumbent in North Carolina. C. It was the biggest age difference between two candidates. D. It made her the third consecutive woman to hold a Senate seat in North Carolina.

og.description:
First elected in 2008, North Carolina Sen. Kay Hagan is facing a tough reelection battle against Republican Statehouse Speaker Thom Tillis. Recent polling shows 
the race too close to call. See how much you know about the North Carolina Democrat:

First elected in 2008, North Carolina Sen. Kay Hagan is facing a tough reelection battle against Republican Statehouse Speaker Thom Tillis. Recent polling shows

article_summary:
What was notable about Kay Hagan’s 2008 Senate win, in which she unseated Elizabeth Dole?
D. It made her the third consecutive woman to hold a Senate seat in North Carolina.
It was the first time a female candidate unseated a female incumbent in North Carolina.
She won by the largest margin in a Senate race.
C. It was the biggest age difference between two candidates.
